OK, i'll explain.

A computer game is a complex piece of software. It consists of an engine and game resources (textures, models, scripts, etc).
A game engine consists of one or more binaries. Usually it has a few shared libraries (.dll) and at least one executable (.exe).
Depending on the copy protection used, it might have some extra .dlls that implement copy protection, and copy protection might be patched into executable(s).

Point is:
As other people commented, this is the full game. It means that all game resources are from the full game, not from the beta.
Also, depending on which files had to be cracked, the difference between beta engine and full game engine may vary. At worst - the whole engine is beta due to beta crack being used. At best - the cracked executable only had some non-critical code related to game startup, and the important engine components were in other modules; which means that while executable will claim that the game is beta, most of the engine is release-grade.

Also, bear in mind that late-stage development usually means that engine only gets bugfixes, but no new features (it takes months for people to implement game on top of an engine; once engine is ready, you have to keep it stable and only fix problems with it, without changing its interface). Because of that you can make an assumption that beta engine and release engine are very similar (i.e. they both use the same resources and use them in the same way). Which means that the game may be fully playable (all quests, all items, all dialogues, etc) even with beta engine. However, beta-grade engine parts can screw up graphics, and they may crash and/or leak memory. It all depend on which parts of the game are implemented in the engine, and which parts are scripted.

That said, i haven't downloaded or run this, so this is mostly speculation. However, people report that this is playable, so i'll assume that it is.

could anybody help me? im from poland and i choose only polish language pack to download, tho i dont have nor voice or subtitles in game and there is no option to change it? any advice ?

How to change language:
Edit data/ini/ConfigDefault.xml

Change the value of "SubtitleLanguage" and "VoiceLanguage" to your language:
For example "VoiceLanguage="Russian""
